name: Combat Knife
description: A standard military knife, sturdy and reliable. Designed for close combat, it is an essential companion for every survivor.

name: Rusty Knife
description: An old work knife, the blade pitted with rust but still sharp. Better than nothing.

name: Folding Knife
description: A small and practical knife, useful both as a tool and as a last-resort defense weapon.

name: Makeshift Knife
description: A sharp blade made from a piece of metal, with a handle wrapped in cloth. Crude, but better than nothing.

name: Deer Antlers
description: The intact antlers of a deer. Can be used as an improvised stabbing weapon, sharp and dangerous.

name: Crowbar
description: A solid piece of metal, perfect for prying open doors or as a crude but effective blunt weapon.

name: Giant Bone Club
description: A massive piece of a rib from a huge creature. It is incredibly dense and tough, perfect for use as a heavy club.

name: Small Caliber Pistol
description: A small caliber pistol, likely a civilian personal defense weapon. Easy to conceal, but with limited stopping power.

name: Military Pistol
description: A military-grade semi-automatic pistol, robust and reliable. A serious weapon for a survivor.

name: Sniper Rifle (Disassembled)
description: The parts of a sniper rifle, carefully hidden. Requires assembly to be used.

name: Throwing Knives
description: A set of perfectly balanced knives, designed to be thrown with precision. A silent attack from a distance.

name: Sharp Dagger
description: A well-balanced dagger, sharpened with precision. Made with quality materials, it is a lethal weapon in the right hands.

name: Makeshift Bow
description: A simple but functional bow, built with flexible wood and nylon cord. Requires arrows to be used effectively.

name: Wooden Spear
description: A rudimentary but effective spear, with a sharp metal tip. Good for keeping enemies at a distance.

name: Vargeon's Greatsword
description: A large two-handed sword of ancient and masterful craftsmanship. Every ring of the mail that accompanied it was hand-woven. The blade bears the engraving 'In Hoc Signo Vinces'. A weapon of a forgotten era, heavy but devastating.
